description: Configuration file for Vitest testing framework in a Vue project, merging Vite configuration with test-specific settings.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges Vite configuration with additional configuration options for testing.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines a configuration object for Vitest.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a URL object to a file path string.
